languages.text: {n}Иокаста почтительно склоняет голову, и тень покидает ее лицо. Она слабо улыбается.{/n} "Благодарю, что сохранили нашу честь, Лорд-капитан".
{n}She bows her head respectfully, and her expression relaxes. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста почтительно склоняет голову, и тень покидает ее лицо. Она слабо улыбается.{/n} "Благодарю, что сохранили нашу честь, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}She bows her head respectfully, and her face clears. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."
{n}She bows her head respectfully, and her face clears. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."

{n}She bows her head respectfully, and her expression relaxes. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Elle incline respectueusement la tête, les traits soudain plus détendus.{/n} « Merci d'avoir rétabli notre honneur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, » {n}répond-elle avec un faible sourire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She bows her head respectfully, and her expression relaxes. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle incline respectueusement la tête, les traits soudain plus détendus.{/n} « Merci d'avoir rétabli notre honneur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, » {n}répond-elle avec un faible sourire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Inclina la cabeza con respeto y su expresión se relaja. Responde con una sonrisa débil:{/n} «Gracias por restaurar nuestro honor, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}She bows her head respectfully, and her expression relaxes. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Inclina la cabeza con respeto y su expresión se relaja. Responde con una sonrisa débil:{/n} «Gracias por restaurar nuestro honor, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}她恭敬地低下了头，表情放松下来，脸上露出了淡淡的笑容。{/n}“谢谢您愿意恢复我们的荣誉，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}She bows her head respectfully, and her expression relaxes. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}她恭敬地低下了头，表情放松下来，脸上露出了淡淡的笑容。{/n}“谢谢您愿意恢复我们的荣誉，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}彼女は礼儀正しく頭を下げた。表情が和らいでいた。彼女は弱々しい笑顔で答えた。{/n}「名誉を回復してくださり、ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}She bows her head respectfully, and her expression relaxes. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は礼儀正しく頭を下げた。表情が和らいでいた。彼女は弱々しい笑顔で答えた。{/n}「名誉を回復してくださり、ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}Sie senkt respektvoll den Kopf und ihre Miene entspannt sich. Sie antwortet mit einem schwachen Lächeln:{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr unsere Ehre wiederhergestellt habt, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}She bows her head respectfully, and her expression relaxes. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie senkt respektvoll den Kopf und ihre Miene entspannt sich. Sie antwortet mit einem schwachen Lächeln:{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr unsere Ehre wiederhergestellt habt, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Başını saygıyla eğiyor ve yüz ifadesi gevşiyor. Zayıf bir gülümsemeyle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Onurumuzu geri verdiğiniz için teşekkür ederiz Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}She bows her head respectfully, and her expression relaxes. She responds with a weak smile,{/n} "Thank you for restoring our honour, Lord Captain."
